Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: [to Gabe] They caught the Scranton Stranger, they trapped him in his house. [run to conference room, everyone is watching the news on a monitor]

Quote.Speaker: Reporter
Quote.Text: Police have now surrounded the apartment complex.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [whispering to Pam] They have him surrounded. It's the SWAT. The SWAT's arriving.

Quote.Speaker: Reporter
Quote.Text: It is unknown if he is armed with anything.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: They should do that thing where they play the really good music to get him to come out.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [sighs] They shouldn't televise any of this, it just encourages copy-cats.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Just say copies, why do you have to drag cats into this.

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: Okay, while this is interesting we should get back to work. These stand-offs can last a long time. What if it's another Waco.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: It's pronounced wacko.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Some events are so news worthy, so historic, that you have to stop everything to watch. Balloon Boy, Michael Jackson's funeral. Things that if you didn't see them live, you wouldn't really care that you didn't see them at all.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Columbia Street in Washington Ave! When is he gonna come out? [phone rings, Kelly answers and hangs up]

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I bet he's wishing he had a hybrid, right? Sixty miles to the gallon in the city.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: No! I bet he's wishing he was strangling someone!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Ok, that's our street! That's our street! He's going down our street! [runs out of conference room.] Come on everybody! [all quickly follow]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [on sidewalk] There it is! I saw it! I saw it! He went right by! You missed it! [all groan]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [collecting pebbles off the street into a jar] Grandpa, where were you the day the the Scranton Strangler was caught? [old man voice] Well kiddo, I was there. I was there... And I'll tell you what. [shakes jar of pebbles] You go sell these and buy yourself a nice spaceship.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Michael!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Walk with me.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Gabe and I are having a party, and everyone's invited, and it's at his house apartment and we're gonna watch Glee.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [obviously faking being serious the whole time] Glee? What is Glee, some television program? Jim I need that thing stat!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [confused] Okay?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Yeah it's a TV show...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Dwight! Sign please. I don't have time for parties I don't have time for TV shows. Stanley! What time is that thing I have to do?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Cancel it! Are you still here? [to Erin]

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Uhh. It's just that it's our first party together so...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: MMM MMM MM MM MM! Did you hear what I said? I'm a very busy man. I don't have time for your TV show.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: [sad] Okay, sorry.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I'm joking.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Wait which one?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I'm joking. I'm kidding around! I'm not actually angry. [Erin laughs] I'm not busy at all, I'm not doing anything. And I know what Glee is, I'm a total Gleek.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Good me too!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You know who my favorite character is? The invalid. [Jim makes a face] I am coming to your party.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: I don't know if Michael likes Gabe that much, but there's this thing on Glee called mash-up, where two things that don't go together, make one great song. Take Gabe, take Michael, you make Gay Mike. Best friends.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: [reacting to Erin's invitation] No really? Is there time to change this?! That show! Now first they say that Mr. Schu doesn't know anything about choreography, then like three episodes later he's this fantastic choreographer?! Pick a lane people!

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: And what was with Jesse's sudden turn on Rachel, between Dream-On and Funk. Where the heck did that come from?! Honestly that show, it's just. It's irresponsible.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Are you going? [to Dwight]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Not because I want to. With all the feeling to base a show around. Glee? Thirst. Now that's a show I'd watch.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: I would watch that.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Tonight might be a convenient night for us to have some intercourse.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [to Erin] You're having a party at Gabe's apartment?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Mhmm! I'd love it if you were there.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: You would?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: You and Michael are always the life of the party!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Try and keep me from coming!

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Why would I keep you from coming?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Try and hide it, I will track this party down!

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Why would I hide it! [giggling]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Kevin!

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Hey, you going tonight?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yes, I am. Are you?

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Yeah! You gotta go to the boss's party!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: What? No Gabe is... Gabe is not the boss.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: No he's not the boss.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Why did you just say he was the boss?

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: 'Cause, you're the boss!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yeeee... Guys! Do you consider Gabe to be the boss?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: [to Michael at Gabe's apartment] It's make your own pizza night. Isn't Gabe's place so nice?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Uh huh...

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Look at the size of those wine glasses Michael!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Big...

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Those posters used to be real French ads.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: All right!

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: So these are your cheeses, your ham, your sausages, your herbs, and your vegetables. Here's what's been done, so start creating. Some times it helps to think of a part of the world, and...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [interrupting] Okay okay okay.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Gabe likes to entertain a lot, ad he cooks in an oven, and all that jazz. I just have a different life style. They have these bags of vegetables that steam right inside their own bag. So I'll get a few ingredients, sit down in front of the TV, a bag of vegetables, before you know it I'm ready for bed!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [tossing pizza dough in the air]

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: You don't really toss the dough.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Try and destroy the old ways, Gabe, well I will not let you. [throws pizza dough, hits the ceiling]

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: [walking with Jim and Pam] Welcome to my Man Cave! I did my senior year in prog in Japan. Best year of my life.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: You play? [referring to keyboard]

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: Oh! I like to play soundscapes. I imagine one instant of a song, expanded to be the size of the universe.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: You can't even do that.

Quote.Speaker: Cece
Quote.Text: [crying]

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: She's up! Great!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Cece, is reverse cycling, which means she sleeps all day and is up all night. Which basically means I'm up all day and I'm up all night. And if it doesn't stop soon, I am going to be up all night.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: [peeking into various rooms] The show's starting. The show's starting! The show's starting! Show's starting! [Glee begins as all get nearby to watch]

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: [to Kelly] Who's that?

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Finn.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Who's that?

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Rachel.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Which one's Glee?

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: You have to stop.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Where's Michael? Where's Michael? We can't start without Michael! Oh here he is! Ohhhh. Yayyy, and let the show begin! [turning up volume]

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: [takes remote] It's a little loud...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Actually I think it's not loud enough. May I? Thank you sah! [takes remote, raises volume] There we go. Glee right? Rock and roll! Turn it up to elevaan! Spinal Cord!

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: [lowers volum] Some of us are trying to have a conversation.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Well some of us are trying to have a...

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: I'll just turn the captions on.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [grabs different remote from the table] Well I will turn up the volume.

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: That's for the other box.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Okay... Heeeere's what we're gonna do! Right down the hall is a bed room. All the real Glee fans are gonna go down the hall to the real Glee party in the bedroom, follow me! Where we can crank it!

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: [noise on TV, Oscar pauses show] That one! She's been in a couple episodes of Friday Night...

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: You know what? I'm so confused. Is this a Glee watching party? Or a Glee pausing party? 'Cause we keep stopping it, to get a history lesson from...

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: You know what? I didn't read the rules, I didn't know the rules. There, it's on. I didn't read the rule book.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: [enters on Michael alone sitting on a bed watching Glee] Michael? Maybe you should try gong in the other room again. You can have my seat. It's closer to the TV. It'll seem louder.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Pam I have a loaded gun in my desk at work. If I ever start acting like that weenie Gabe I want you to take that gun, and I want you to shoot me like a hundred times in the groin until I'm dead. Okay?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: You have a gun in your desk?

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: [in Gabe's bedroom with Andy] Hey! Marantz Tubes Sterio. From the 1970's. I respect that. I respect that a lot. Oh hoho. The five Chinese Berilidy Herbs. No kidding. This is powdered seahorse. They say that fifteen Chinese soldiers fought off the entire army of Gangus Kong just using this stuff. You know what they say...

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: No what?

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: What is this, Samurai wood cuts? Yep. Pretty erotic.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [Pam in the background struggling with Cece] Better men than Gabe have tried to be my boss. David got fired. Charles got fired. Jan went crazy. Ed Truck, who I liked, got decapitated.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Michael, I find it absolutely disgraceful that no one followed you in here for your walk-out. I took the liberty of making a list of everyone who didn't follow you in here. Jim. Oscar. Creed. Me, at first.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Maybe I should go.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [continuing] Kelly. Kev- [to Pam] Are you gonna quiet that baby? Or do I have to? [Dwight grabs Cece and makes noises, Cece stops crying] In the Schrute family, the youngest child always raises the others. I've been raising children since I was a baby.

Quote.Speaker: Daryl
Quote.Text: [to Andy] Take a shot.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Oh thanks.

Quote.Speaker: Daryl
Quote.Text: Wow, so much Asia stuff. I wonder if there's a guy in China right now, looking at a bunch of our stuff.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Why does Erin like Gabe?

Quote.Speaker: Daryl
Quote.Text: Andy look, all I know is that if I was a girl, and I had to choose between the tall dude who loved Asia, and the you looking dude who loves sweaters and wearing sweaters... I'd choose you.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: That's really nice, thank you.

Quote.Speaker: Daryl
Quote.Text: And I'd blow your mind.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [pours powdered seahorse into his wine glass]

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [changes channel during commercial, sports scores appear on screen.]

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Jim what are you doing?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh, it was commercial break so I just wanted to check the scores.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Flip it back please.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Okay... [changes back to Glee]

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: The show's back on, what happened?

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: We're behind.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Go to the recorded version.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Oh my God what song was that?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: I wasn't recording it.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: What?!

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: [texting] What song was it?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Wait, why do you have to record it?

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: This is why Erin! We're living it! Start recording now!

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Jim. [Jim gives her the remote]

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Okay, they did Blinded by the Light and they did it with an actual blind guy. Was it worth it Jim? [Jim leaves] 'Cause we missed it!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: If I could get her sleeping normally I could get my life back.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: That would be nice wouldn't it?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I can't even talk about it.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: You know it's not really necessary for me to sit here holding her all night. Just go into Gabe's refrigerator, get a lump of suit, or any kind of congealed animal fat will do rally, tie a piece of string to it and the other end to her toe, put the suit in her mouth, she'll be happy for hours.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I kind of doubt Gabe has suit.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Really? Oh... Then here we are.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Michael. Gabe is making the pigs in a blanket, and he kind of needs some [Dwight shushes her] help so, [Erin whispering] he was wondering if you could help him. [Michael goes with Erin]

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [enters room where Phyllis is pouring wine, using stadium announcer voice] Ladies and gentlemen please welcome, Phyllis Vance! [sniffs her] Isn't that White Diamonds Maya Smith Taylor?

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: You know your perfumes!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: My nanny used to wear that.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I just ate powdered seahorse! I have to admit I did not think it was gonna work, but it is totally working! [clip of him doing pull ups in Gabe's doorway] I feel exactly like a seahorse! [Seahorse impression] Blub blub blub blub blub blub blub blub.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Look who I found! [points to Michael]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yeah, well I wasn't very hard to find.

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: Let's go ahead and wash our hands.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Is this the same dough you used for the pizza crust?

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: Yep! Waste not right?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: So these are pizza dogs, they aren't pigs in a blanket per se.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Michael knows everything there is to know about snacks,

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Well...

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Gabe was born in 1982. He was the longest baby in the hospital.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: He's the longest baby in this room.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: What's the longest thing you've ever seen? [Michael chuckles] For me it was the tale from Jets.

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: Erin you don't have to...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You know what Erin you do have to.

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: Michael! You are making this harder than it has to be.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [grimacing] That's what she said. [leaves]

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [whispering] Hey.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: It's a miracle. She loves him.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I don't know about, love...

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: She loves me.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: [whispers in Dwight's ear] Outside my car in two minutes.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Well something's come up, I have to go.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: No no no no no! She'll wake up!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I have something to do.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Look, I know what you have to do, please stay with Cece. Dwight? I've always considered for us to be very good friends. Great friends! Remember your concussion?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I do. But you married my worst enemy.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Well I think enemy's a strong word. 'Cause I think we have a really charming back and forth. And-

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Enough. I will require beer and pizza to think this over.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Absolutely! [starts out]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: From Jim.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I don't think that's gonna...

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Do it!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: What kind of pizza would you like?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Surprise me. No! Pepperoni.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [outside opening Gabe's cable hookup box] Okay... Alright.

Quote.Speaker: TV
Quote.Text: And the winner is, by two votes- [TV goes blank]

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Ahhh! What's going on?!?!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [muttering going on all around, Andy looks sick] Hey Creed, would you read Chinese?

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: Beleniege!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: What does this say?

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: HI mahhhh. Boo yowww. Gunjo! Ooh uncow!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [confused, rushes out of the room to the room Erin's in, picks up phone, talking fast] Hello UPS! Still waiting on that five minutes with Erin order. Oh never mind it's here. Oh if it isn't the bell of the ball! [queasily] You throw a lovely party ma lady...

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: [concerned] Are you having a good time?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Did you wear my favorite outfit on purpose?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Andy you look awful!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: You're four seasons in a day. [heaves] You... got the Autumn thing going on. But if you put on ba- [heaves again] Put if you put on a blue... [stops, is struggling] It's Spring Time in the Rockies!

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Are you alright?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: No! [runs off]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [referring to the pizza Jim is offering him] Insert it in my mouth.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: That's not gonna make your pizza eating experience any better. Trust me.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: No, try me.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Jim, just don't think of it as degrading. Think of it as, you happen to be moving the six inches his way and he happens to be biting it.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I'd prefer for him to think of it as degrading.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Okay... [puts pizza into Dwight's mouth]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: No. Crust first. [Jim turns the pizza around] Okay, now the beer. [Jim shakes his head no] Beer me Jim. [Jim quickly puts the beer into his face] Ssss. Gentle. [drinks the beer] Now I've gotta go meet Angela.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: What no, wait! You said you were gonna help us!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I have a legal obligation to Angela. Okay, she needs to be serviced.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: You need to stop talking.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Oh come on, stop the fake prissy act. We're in the real world. Sex contracts exist!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Okay fine! There must be some way to get out of it. Even just for tonight!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Yeah sure, Jim could go see her.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [unbelievingly] Okay...

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: You ever been with the blondes before? It's the big leagues.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I'm going home, and I'm taking my baby with me.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: No no no, don't. I will go talk to Angela.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: She's in heat. She will eat your face off!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: The reverse cycling ends tonight! [Pam leaves]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [to Jim] A single piece of pepperoni please.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I'm not gonna- [cuts himself off, Kevin walks in]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: What are you doing?

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: [getting under the bed covers] I wanted to eat a pig in a blanket, in a blanket!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [throws up on bed] Puts pillow in front of the puke.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Are you alright?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Erin likes Gabe.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: I know. I thought you two were nice together.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Do you think that they've ever...

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Made love? I don't know.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Well girls tell each other things right?

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: I'll see what I can find out.

Quote.Speaker: Daryl
Quote.Text: [Michael walks into disarray of people's reactions to the TV going out] Where you been?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I just went out for a walk.

Quote.Speaker: Daryl
Quote.Text: Cable's out.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: What? Really? That stinks!

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: It's still on upstairs.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: What does that mean? Party's over? Everybody leaves? Are you sure?

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: [receiving message on his phone] Hey! Puck and Finn worked it out, and the solo is now a duet.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Are you kidding me?

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Now that's going on?

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: I can't believe we're missing that!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Boy I wish I could see that. You know what? I have an idea. I don't know if it's gonna work, but let me give it this. Okay, I'm gonna give it shot. [hurries out]

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Please Michael, just make the Glee happen!

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Good luck Michael!

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Erin! Uhm, so how long have you two been going out now?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Oh, uhm, like three months.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: And I imagine things are starting to heat up?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: I don't know.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Of course you don't wanna rush things! I mean the anticipation can be so exquisite. Bob and I took our time. The first time we saw each other naked we didn't even make love, we just stared at each other until we fell asleep. It was magical.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: [awkwardly] I have to go Phyllis.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Magical...

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: [knocking on Angela's car window, Angela is naked inside] Hey in there. It's Pam. It's not Dwight! Don't think it's Dwight!

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: What are you doing here?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I know you and Dwight have this weird deal, uhm, he sent me out here to see if you could postpone.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Are you authorized to do this?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Yes! I have been so authorized.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Ok, uhm, then tell him that we'll do this tomorrow night instead.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Wait Pam! How did he seem? Like, you know, did he seem disappointed?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: You know, there are a lot of guys out there who would just love and appreciate a-

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: You know what Pam just save it.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: [Michael is outside fixing the cable box] You did this?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No I was just check- Yeah. Yes I did, yeah yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Why don't you like him?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: What is there to like? He's just, he's a weird little skeevy guy with no waist, why do you care whether we like him or not?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: I care if you like him.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Why? I'm not your father. [Erin looks sad] All right.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Okay...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Go to your room.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: What? [confused]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Go to your room young lady!

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: [slowly getting it] Uhm, I'm not going to my room.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You listen to me. You listen good. You are are not, to see that boy, anymore.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: You listen to me. You are not to tell me what to do.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: As long as you are living under this roof you are going to do what I say.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: I hate your roof!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh do not raise your voice to me!

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: I'll raise it how I want! I'll raise the roof!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Gahh, I will pull this car over!

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: I hate it! I hate your car!

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: See ya Oscar! [Oscar leaves]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [enters, looks to Gabe] If you break that girl's heart, I will kill you. It's just a figure of speech. But seriously, if you break that girl's heart I will literally kill you and your entire family.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Gabe, just go and have fun with Erin. But not too much fun! That girl's gonna turn my hair gray.

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: [Andy is leaning over toilet] What happened?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I accidentally ate some seahorses.

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: How much?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I didn't know it's powdered, so like four or five, I don't know.

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: I've got just the thing! [leaves, comes back with a synthesizer] This one's called Earth Rise, on the Moon. [music plays]

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: That's so beautiful.
